label: full name
text: Jason Alexander Christakos

label: pronouns
text: he/him

label: gender
text: self-described "93% male"; may be either a cis man or trans man depending on the story (was originally cis but lately have been shifting more toward writing him as trans)

label: birth date
text: January 26, 1991

label: MBTI
text: ENFP

label: orientation
text: queer; achillean; preference for men and masc-leaning folks

label: race/ethnicity
text: white American; half Greek and half various Western European descent

label: family
text: very close with older sister Mel; on bad terms with parents; has a pretty cool aunt

label: other relationships
text: madly in love with Zack in basically all universes, though their relationship usually ends badly

label: location
text: born in Trenton, NJ; mostly grows up in Columbus, OH; in a few timelines moves to Philadelphia, PA for a while; in some timelines goes to Boston, MA for college; in most timelines ends up living in Pittsburgh, PA eventually

label: occupation
text: eventually ends up pusuing a PhD in cognitive science, in most timelines

label: neurotype/mental health
text: ADHD; bipolar depression; in some timelines, addiction

label: build
text: pretty average and unremarkable, maybe just a little on the slender side

label: voice
text: coarse and a little nasally. speaks quickly and has a loud, sudden laugh. often needs to be reminded to be quieter.

label: manner
text: upbeat, very energetic. can appear standoffish, but usually has a pretty warm demeanor. very fidgety.

label: aesthetic
text: Hot Topic

label: favorite color
text: yellow

label: favorite bands
text: Pink Floyd, Smashing Pumpkins, Nine Inch Nails

text: lemon

label: other motifs
text: lightning, yellow heart emoji
